COMMAND_DEFAULT - Static variable in annotation type org.nise.ux.asl.data.MapCommand
 
CommandChain - Annotation Type in org.nise.ux.asl.data
Annotation to chain commands with their after execution handlers, Methods implementing this annotation must have two input arguments: one Object for return object of (command) function one Throwable input for possible {Exception or Error} occured Example:
@MapCommand(command = "example")
public ReturnObject someFunction(List input) {
   ReturnObject returnObject = new ReturnObject();
   ...
   return returnObject;
}

@CommandChain(after = "example", name = "dummy")
public void test(ReturnObject returnObject, Throwable t) {
   ...
}
create() - Method in class org.nise.ux.asl.run.ServiceServerBuilder
Creates a server listening on defined LISTENING_PORT
